entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Who the F cares.  We had nearly 2,000 more US people die today as a result of the Coronavirus. You know the virus - the one that you sat on for a few months calling it a democrat hoax and media conspiracy against your re-election.  SICK and EVIL
